title: Enable Language Server
description: Use the gopls language server for enhanced functionality. The gopls command should be installed in your search path, or you can specify the full path below.

title: Language Server Command
description: The command name to start the gopls language server. Use an absolute path here if gopls is not in your search path.

children.title: Use Placeholders
children.description: Enables placeholders for function parameters or struct fields in completion responses.

children.title: Hover Kind
children.description: Controls the information that appears in the hover text. SingleLine and Structured are intended for use only by authors of editor plugins.

children.title: Local Imports
children.description: The equivalent of the goimports -local flag, which puts imports beginning with this string after 3rd-party packages. It should be the prefix of the import path whose imports should be grouped separately.

children.title: Complete Unimported
children.description: Enable completion for packages that you do not currently imported

children.title: Deep Completion
children.description: Enable the ability to return completions from deep inside relevant entities, rather than just the locally accessible ones.

children.title: Completion Matching
children.description: Sets the algorithm that is used when calculating completion candidates.

children.title: Symbol Matching
children.description: Sets the algorithm that is used when finding workspace symbols.

children.title: Symbol Style
children.description: Controls how symbols are qualified in symbol responses.

children.title: Hover Links
children.description: Toggles the presence of links to documentation in hover.

children.title: Import Shortcut
children.description: Specifies whether import statements should link to documentation or go to definitions.

children.title: Enable RPC trace
children.description: Turns on gopls RPC tracing in the extension console.
